dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcomeMessage: Here's what's happening with your account today.

brand.name: sass-edd-template
brand.description: A modern Next.js template with authentication, internationalization, and beautiful UI components. Built with the latest technologies.

footer.builtWith: Built with ❤️ using modern web technologies

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Meet our team, discover our values, and learn how we balance work, life, and everything in between.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description1: For years, the process of building custom software has been challenging. Today, companies need technical expertise and a lot of time. This requires companies and individuals to hire expensive developers.
vision.description2: What if you could create custom software without writing a single line of code? What if you could build your own work?
vision.description3: We believe that everyone should be able to build their own solutions, regardless of their technical background.

creators.title: Our Creators
creators.description1: Our company has been building with tools for over a decade, focusing on making each project unique. We know that the best software is the one you can create yourself.
creators.description2: We specifically developed these solutions for our team, and now everyone can benefit from them. We are proud to offer a platform that is truly superior.
creators.description3: Our team is made up of talented individuals who are passionate about creating tools that actually work with your goals, and we can't wait to see what you build.
